step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job sitting or standing comfortably. Try to place your hands a little lower on your abdomen to better feel the movement.
Good effort placing your hands on your abdomen. For the next steps, focus on a slower inhale and exhale to maximize the muscle engagement.
You're effectively tightening your muscles during the inhale. Remember to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest to enhance the lymphatic stimulation.
Excellent job relaxing your muscles on the exhale. Keep visualizing pushing the fluid out to support lymphatic drainage.

exercise_summary: You're doing well with this deep breathing exercise! Remember to place your hands on your lower abdomen and focus on slow, controlled breaths. Visualize fluid movement to help your lymphatic system.
